dialogue.text: Hey, Sana. Why are you just standing out here?
Oh...umm...hi, Sensei...
I don’t...really know...
I just felt like...I was supposed to...for some reason...
Well, that's weird. But I guess I'm not really one to talk given my circumstances for being here.
What...kind of circumstances are-
Anyway, want to talk for a little while? Might help the two of us kill some time.
Assuming you're not busy, of course. Which I doubt you are since you're kind of just...standing here.
Y-Yeah...I'm not doing anything...
My mom is handling the bar to...give me time to study, but...
Studying is kind of...really boring...
I can help you if you want. You might not know this, but I'm actually a teacher.
I had...no idea...
I think I’ll...be okay, though...
We can talk about something else instead...Something that doesn't make me want to fall asleep...
Sounds good. Maybe you can tell me a little about what your mom is like?
My...mom? Why do you want to know about her?...
Just wondering if that’s where you get any of your qualities from. The idea of an entire family of timid cyclops girls is quite amusing to me.
You...do know I...have a second eye...right?...
If you say so, Sana.
Uhh...anyway...
My mom and I...aren't really that much alike...
I...do look like her, though...
As much as I like Sana for her current appearance, I can't help but wonder what an aged up version would look like.
I'm sure I won't have to wonder for long, though. The two of us are bound to cross paths eventually.
I’m guessing your mom's a lot more talkative than you are?
That’s...{i}one{/i} way to put it...
She’s...umm...
Just...just go ahead and assume she's my...exact opposite...
You’ll...find out whenever you meet her...
Any way I describe her would...make her sound a lot worse than...she actually is...
That's...an interesting way to describe your mother. But I'll take your word for it.
How are things with Ayane, then? I'm a little curious as to how you two ended up in the same dorm together.
That just...kind of happened, I guess?
I...don’t really have any friends other than her...And Ami and Maya were already together, so...
Process of elimination?
That makes it sound incredibly depressing.
I know, but...it really isn't like that...
We...actually {i}are{/i} good friends, so...
You don't have to...feel bad for me or anything...
Great. Because that whole {i}sympathy{/i} thing isn't really one of my strong suits.
I'm not sure if...I understand what you mean by that, but...I like living with Ayane...
She kind of...makes up for all of the things I'm lacking in...
I just wish...she'd listen to...better music every once in a while...
I guess there {i}is{/i} that whole saying about how opposites attract, so it's not bizarre to assume Ayane and Sana pair well together.
Lump the quietest girl together with the most talkative one and there's sure to be some sort of...dynamic there.
But to have both her best friend {i}and{/i} her mother be completely different from her?
I feel like that could get...exhausting.
Well, I’m happy {i}you're{/i} comfortable around her. That makes one of us.
I know she...comes on strong...especially with you...
But...I don't think you...have any reason to feel uncomfortable, Sensei...
We'll see about that, I guess.
In the meantime, though, I'll let you get back to your compulsion to stand around the hall and neglect your education.
Oh...okay...I...
I guess I'll...see you later, then?...
I'm sure you will. I plan on spending a lot of time in this hallway.
I'm not really sure how I...feel about that...
Sana and I talk for another minute or so before I leave the dorms and get on with my night.
She did mostly well this time, but I know that she's the type to get burned out by extensive conversations, so I figure it’s best to just leave her alone after a while.
As I step outside, I ponder what a fully adjusted and comfortable Sana Sakakibara would be like.
There's no way she can stay so reclusive forever, is there?
I wonder how long it will be until I can see a new side of her?
I wonder if I'll like that one even more.
{i}Sana’s affection has increased to [sana_love]!{/i}
